Name: Fiora
AbilityDescription:
Fiora lunges at her enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and activates her Duelist's Soul for 8 seconds, While her Duelist's Soul is active, she takes 20% less damage and her attacks restore Health.

Percent of Attack Damage : 225% / 225% / 250%

Heal : 30 / 40 / 55
